Index.meta_description: Next js Boilerplate est le code de démarrage parfait pour votre projet. Construisez votre application React avec le framework Next.js.

Portfolio.meta_description: Bienvenue sur la page de mon portfolio !
Portfolio.presentation: Bienvenue sur ma page portfolio ! Vous trouverez ici une collection soigneusement organisée de mon travail et de mes réalisations. À travers ce portfolio, je mets en valeur mon expertise, ma créativité et la valeur que je peux apporter à vos projets.

PortfolioSlug.content: Créé un ensemble de matériel promotionnel et d'éléments de marquage pour un événement d'entreprise. Conçu un thème visuellement unifié, englobant un logo, des affiches, des bannières et des actifs numériques. Intégrer l'identité de marque du client tout en l'insufflant à une approche contemporaine et innovante. Des réponses favorables de la part des participants ont été obtenues, ce qui a donné lieu à un événement réussi avec un engagement accru des participants et une meilleure visibilité de la marque.

SignUp.meta_description: Créez un compte sans effort grâce à notre processus d'inscription intuitif.

Goals.description: MAIN STAGE, DEEP-DIVE WORKSHOPS, ROUNDTABLES, MENTORING ZONE, SERENITY CORNER, F&B, GALA DINNER

About.title: What is Edvent
About.description: The Women's Empowerment Convention is the ultimate destination for the world's successful women leaders, setting new standards and breaking barriers. More than just an event, it is a bold, vibrant community where global women leaders unite to challenge norms, celebrate achievements, and inspire greatness. We create a dynamic space of connection, learning, and empowerment, emphasizing that if you are a successful woman, this is where you belong. Join us to showcase your brilliance and drive transformative change, making the WE Convention the ultimate platform for women worldwide.

Speakers.title: Meet our 2024 speakers
Speakers.description: We're constantly adding new, exciting speakers to our lineup. Prepare to be inspired, motivated, and amazed as we bring you top-notch experts, thought leaders, and women role models. Stay tuned for updates on our growing list of speakers.
Speakers.musk: international author, Doctor of Dietetics, supermodel, and speaker
Speakers.malone: the legendary founder of the namesake fragrance brand
Speakers.johnson: former Mayor of London and ex-Prime Minister of the United Kingdom
Speakers.pence: the distinguished former Vice President of the United States
Speakers.small_description: The biggest mistake in life is limiting yourself to small goals. Encouraging to set big goals, overcoming barriers to success and reaching your full career potential.
Speakers.experience: Experience more opportunities for discovery, networking, learning, and career-enhancing connections than ever before at EDVENT 2024 from April 20-21 in Tashkent.

Venues.title: Venues
Venues.description: The new iconic landmark of Dubai, Atlantis The Royal is an ultra-luxury destination that has been designed to challenge the boundaries of imagination. For 2 days, be taken on an incredible journey where everything is possible and you can achieve it all. This is the place to realize your Big Goals and Bold Choices.

push.title: Push your career
push.description: Learn from the personal journeys of recognized role models, gain practical advice, receive expert support to advance your career and professional growth to attain success.

empower.title: GET EMPOWERED
empower.description: Join the most unique meeting of women and men who empower women from around the world. Unlock your potential and be inspired to achieve your goals!

build.title: BUILD NEW CONNECTIONS
build.description: Connect with a diverse community that wants to support you and find those who can help you ignite your brightest future.

Feedback.title: WHAT PEOPLE SAY ABOUT EDVENT
Feedback.feedback_text: “One of the best and so professional Events, thank you”
Feedback.name: Zhanna Khan

Highlights.title: Edvent 2023 Highlights
Highlights.description: On March 7-8, 2023, the first WE Convention ignited change by celebrating International Women's Day at the Dubai Opera and Armani Hotel. Featuring influential speakers like Maye Musk and Natalia Vodianova, the kick-off event encouraged engaging discussions across multiple stages and sessions. This significant gathering laid a solid foundation for future WE Conventions, highlighting the global impact and importance of women's empowerment in business and beyond.

Trailer.title: WATCH THE edvent 2023 TRAILER
Trailer.subtitle: MEET THE ESTEEMED COMPANIES THAT JOINED US AT THE edvent 2024
Trailer.description: We celebrate women's leadership and empower women with the support of these organizations. Partner with WE Convention. Join us to empower women worldwide in April 2024.

Opportunity.title: VOLUNTEER OPPORTUNITIES AT THE edvent 2024
Opportunity.description: As the WE Convention continues to grow and inspire, we are excited to announce that this year we are opening our doors to volunteer support. This is a unique opportunity to become an integral part of one of the most significant global women's leadership events.
Opportunity.balls: We are looking for passionate, dedicated individuals who are eager to contribute to the success of the convention.
Opportunity.instructions: TO APPLY, PLEASE SEND YOUR RESUME ALONG WITH A BRIEF NOTE EXPLAINING WHY YOU WOULD LIKE TO VOLUNTEER AT THE WE CONVENTION TO OUR “JOIN US“ EMAIL AT VOLUNTEERS@WECONVENTION.COM. SHARE WITH US ANY SPECIFIC SKILLS OR EXPERIENCES THAT YOU BELIEVE WOULD CONTRIBUTE TO YOUR ROLE AS A VOLUNTEER.
Opportunity.greet: We look forward to receiving your application and potentially welcoming you to our dynamic volunteer team!
